an3.131:4.1: “Mendicants, three things are conveyed under cover, not in the open.
an3.131:4.3: Females are married with a veil, not unveiled.
an3.131:4.4: Brahmin hymns are conveyed under cover, not openly.
an3.131:4.5: Wrong view is conveyed under cover, not in the open.
an3.131:4.6: These three things are conveyed under cover, not in the open.
an3.131:5.1: Three things shine in the open, not under cover.
an3.131:5.3: The moon shines in the open, not under cover.
an3.131:5.4: The sun shines in the open, not under cover.
an3.131:5.5: The teaching and training announced by a Realized One shine in the open, not under cover.
an3.131:5.6: These three things shine in the open, not under cover.
